results.content: I was disappointed with the course project. It was not what I hopped for at all the system that was built in the course was not user friendly at all and it was messy.

response.content:
Hello Divinewill,
Skipping over lecture which results in failing to understand the the structure of Laravel doesn't make the system messy. In fact Laravel is considered the best PHP framework due to it's clean and organized code. I'd highly recommend going thought lectures carefully and writing the code yourself if you really want to become a professional Laravel developer. Good luck.
